episode_event_newyear_2025/4001_1001_020: Mmmuuuggghhh... I couldn’t beat you today...
episode_event_newyear_2025/4001_1001_030: Oh hey, Raihan. Were you battling Poppy?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4001_1001_040: Yep! Got my revenge from some time ago!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4001_1001_050:
Impressive. Your talent is clearly comparable to
the Elite Four’s. You may even be as strong as a
Champion.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4001_1001_060:
Even we can’t let our guard down when
battling Poppy.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4001_1001_080:
There’s actually another kind of battle I wanna
have with you!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4001_1001_090:
Oh? What is it? Just so you know, Double Battles
are the great Raihan’s expertise!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4001_1001_100: No, the battle I want is...
episode_event_newyear_2025/6801_1031_010:
Time for a super serious
battle!
episode_event_newyear_2025/6801_1001_010: Do you have a lot of online friends?
episode_event_newyear_2025/6801_1001_020: You mean my social media followers?
episode_event_newyear_2025/6801_1001_030:
They’re not exactly my friends—more like my fans!
But they sure know how to keep things exciting.
episode_event_newyear_2025/6801_1001_040: When I grow up, I want a ton of followers, too!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4002_1001_020: My New Year’s resolution is to make more friends!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4002_1001_030: So I wanna see which of us can make the most!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4002_1001_050:
I’m game, but you know I won’t go easy on
you, right?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4002_1001_070: It’ll be our very own serious battle!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_010: All kinds of people are here!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_030:
I guess we can’t just randomly make friends
with people.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_040:
Hi there! You look super cute! Mind if I ask you
something?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_060: Oh, I wasn’t talking to you.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_080: Guess you wanted something from Poppy?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_100:
Sorry, I should have introduced myself.
I’m Blossom.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_110:
I’m an apprentice of Valerie’s. She’s a Gym Leader
from Kalos.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_120:
Valerie, huh. She’s a famous fashion designer,
right?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_130: Indeed! I’m also studying fashion design.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_140:
And a thought came to mind when I saw you,
because you’re as cute as a doll!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_150: Would you mind trying on an outfit I made?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_170: Of course! I’d love to get all dressed up!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4003_1001_210: I wanna ask you something, too.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_020:
I usually have no trouble chatting with
people, but...
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_030:
Come to think of it, what does it really mean to
be friends with someone?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_040:
I might feel lost, but I still look good. Maybe I
should snap a quick selfie.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_070: I’m Adaman, leader of the Diamond Clan!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_080:
I don’t want to waste my time, so I’ll just cut to
the chase!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_090:
Why do people take so many pictures of
themselves?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_100:
Everyone on Pasio seems to. It’s not like your face
looks any different, so what’s the point?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_110: Hmm. That might be true, but only to an extent.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_120:
When you experience something, your expression
in the moment can’t be replicated!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_130:
I see. I guess as time passes, your emotions and
memories start to fade, huh.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_150:
I have a feeling we’d get along. What’s your
name?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_160: I’m Raihan, a Gym Leader from Galar!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_170:
And I just remembered! You’re that guy from
Sinnoh from a long time ago.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_180:
Ah! Saves me time explaining things! I knew we’d
get along. So...
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_190:
And so I got to learn some ninja tricks—and a
few new recipes, too.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_200: Wow! You’ve done a lot of cool stuff!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_210: Hmm, I’d love to hear more of his stories.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_220: And I wanna battle someone from Hisui.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_230: Hey, Adaman! I wanna ask you something!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_260: It’s been great hanging out with you!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_270: All right! How about a battle, then?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_290: By the way, I’ve never seen that Pokémon in Hisui.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_300:
This is Sandaconda! He’s great at creating
sandstorms and stirring up battles.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_310:
With Sandaconda’s sandstorm, you could definitely
hide like a ninja!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_320:
Oh yeah! Before we battle, do you want to stop
by the souvenir shop?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4004_1001_330:
They’ve an outfit that’d suit you and
Sandaconda perfectly!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4005_1001_010: Whoaaa! She looks tougher than steel!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4005_1001_020: Umm... Hi, miss! Wanna be my friend?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4005_1001_040:
Poppy, you confused her by asking out of nowhere
like that.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4005_1001_050:
You should tell her about your friend-making
battle.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4005_1001_070:
Rika? Are you that person Whitney was
talking about?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4005_1001_100:
I’m also a Gym Leader from Johto. My name’s
Jasmine.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4005_1001_130:
*chuckle* Steel-type Pokémon are great,
aren’t they?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4006_1001_010: That outfit caught my eye a while back.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4006_1001_020:
And when I saw you and Sandaconda, I knew it’d
be perfect for you!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4006_1001_040: I like the ninja-like design. It matches Sandaconda!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4006_1001_050:
Sandaconda! Let’s give Adaman and Leafeon a
taste of our teamwork!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4006_1001_060: We won’t lose, either! Let’s do to this, Leafeon!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4006_1001_070: Let the winds blow! Stream forward, Sandstorm!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4007_1001_010: Yaaay! I have a new outfit!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4007_1001_030:
You’re welcome. I’m glad I got to create some
quality work, too.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4007_1001_040:
You really do look as cute as a doll in that outfit,
Poppy!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4007_1001_050: Heheheh! I’m more than just cute, you know!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4007_1001_070:
As a sign of our friendship, there’s a Pokémon I’d
like to entrust you with.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4007_1001_080: I’m sure you’d take great care of her!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4008_1001_010:
Taking on a powerhouse opponent is great, but
there’s something special about battling a friend!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4008_1001_020: I hope we can battle more and—
episode_event_newyear_2025/4008_1001_050:
So...I’ve been competing with someone to see who
can make the most friends.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4008_1001_060:
But I was having so much fun chatting and
battling, I totally forgot!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4008_1001_070:
So basically, you haven’t made any friends other
than me.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4008_1001_080: Want me to introduce you to some people?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4008_1001_090: Thanks, but I can’t accept that.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4008_1001_100: This is a serious battle. I don’t wanna cheat.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4008_1001_120:
You shouldn’t force new friendships. That’s
something I’ve learned from all this.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4008_1001_130:
I might’ve lost...but I’m gonna be honest about
what happened!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_020: Ta-da! Here are all my new friends!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_040: Uh-huh! She’s also my new friend!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_050: I got this outfit as a symbol of friendship, too!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_060: I’m impressed! Didn’t think you’d do so well!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_070: Adaman’s the only new friend I made!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_080:
I also got a cool new outfit, but I guess you
did, too.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_110:
Looks like! I am a little disappointed...but congrats,
Poppy!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_130: But I’m sure the time spent wasn’t a waste.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_150:
Hey, we gotta capture this moment. Wanna snap a
pic together, Adaman?
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_170: I’m the winner of making the most friends...
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_180:
but when it comes to making deep friends, I think
I lost!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_200:
Yeah! The two of them became suuuch good
friends, I feel a little jealous!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_210: Yes, it’s hard to believe they met only yesterday.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_220: But my friends and I will keep getting closer!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_230:
And I hope we get to have more and more
battles, Raihan!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_250: I’m always ready for a challenge from you, Poppy.
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_280:
All right. Now that we’ve all these new friends,
let’s celebrate with a photo!
episode_event_newyear_2025/4009_1001_290:
Everyone, look at the camera! Ready?
One, two, three!
